Detailed Description

OGREGraphicsObjectParticleSystemGraphics system object wrapping the Ogre ParticleFX particle system.

Math::Vector3 OGREGraphicsObjectParticleSystem::m_LastPosition [protected]

OGREGraphicsObjectParticleSystem object last position recorded for this object used to calculate a direction (velocity) vector.

OGREGraphicsObjectParticleSystem object orientation quaternion.

Math::Vector3 OGREGraphicsObjectParticleSystem::m_Scale [protected]

OGREGraphicsObjectParticleSystem object scale.

std::string OGREGraphicsObjectParticleSystem::m_strPSystemName [protected]

OGREGraphicsObjectParticleSystem object Ogre3D particle system material string ID name. (This value must be unique from all other particle system objects in the scene).

std::string OGREGraphicsObjectParticleSystem::m_strPSystemSource [protected]

OGREGraphicsObjectParticleSystem object Ogre3D particle system .particle source script (This is the script name not the file name).

ParticleSystemType OGREGraphicsObjectParticleSystem::m_PSystemType [protected]

OGREGraphicsObjectParticleSystem object denotes special handling for the particle system. E.g. Type_FireHose receives special updates from the Input system, and camera positioning and orientation updates whereas Type_Default receives position updates only from whatever object it tracks from the .cdf link section.

Ogre::Real OGREGraphicsObjectParticleSystem::m_emissionRate [protected]

OGREGraphicsObjectParticleSystem object Ogre3D particle system emission rate as read from the script file.

Bool OGREGraphicsObjectParticleSystem::m_bEmitParticles [protected]

OGREGraphicsObjectParticleSystem object specifies whether or not to emit particles. (This does not destroy the particle system, but rather sets the emission rate to 0.
